item.title: Succession War Over, Lachlan Murdoch Turns to Next Era of Empire Building
item.description: With Rupert’s blessing, his eldest son outfought, outlasted and ultimately spent billions buying out his siblings as his brother James throws in the towel on trying to force changes to Fox and News Co

item.description: With Rupert’s blessing, his eldest son outfought, outlasted and ultimately spent billions buying out his siblings as his brother James throws in the towel on trying to force changes to Fox and News Co

item.title: Lachlan Wins Murdoch Succession War as Siblings Take Major Buyouts, Legal Battle Settles
item.description: James, Elisabeth and Prudence will receive cash from the sale of News Corp. and Fox stock.

item.title: Guy Pearce in Talks to Star as Rupert Murdoch in Danny Boyle’s ‘Ink’
item.description: Jack O’Connell is also eyeing a starring role in the film focusing on the media mogul.

item.title: Rupert Murdoch Plots a Newspaper War In L.A.
item.description: The launch of a New York Post offshoot in California may seem like side show. But News Corp sees a real chance to carve away audience from The Los Angeles Times with its tabloid formula. Is the Times

item.title: Trump Cites Rupert Murdoch’s Age in Bid to Depose Him Right Away in WSJ Lawsuit
item.description: President Trump asked a court Monday to order an expedited deposition of Rupert Murdoch in his suit against the Wall Street Journal, citing the mogul’s advanced age. Trump sued Murdoch on July 1

item.title: Trump’s End Game With The Wall Street Journal Defamation Lawsuit
item.description: There’s a case to be made that the president wants the lawsuit to get dismissed, or at least doesn’t plan to take it all the way to the finish line before a jury.

item.title: Trump’s End Game With The Wall Street Journal Defamation Lawsuit
item.description: There’s a case to be made that the president wants the lawsuit to get dismissed, or at least doesn’t plan to take it all the way to the finish line before a jury.

item.title: Trump Files Defamation Lawsuit Against Wall Street Journal Over Epstein Report
item.description: The lawsuit sets the stage for another legal showdown initiated by Trump against the media, this time against his close ally Rupert Murdoch.
